customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue: CASE WHEN {custrecord_wrm_reg_warrantyexpire}-{today} >= 0 THEN 'Under Warranty' WHEN {custrecord_wrm_reg_warrantyterm.custrecord_wrm_terms_termtype} = 'Lifetime' THEN 'Under Warranty' WHEN {custrecord_wrm_reg_warrantyexpire}-{today} < 0 THEN 'Out of Warranty' ELSE '' END
customrecordcustomfield.label: Status
